summary:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Ether plummets 10% in a day, dragging Bitcoin and other shitcoins down with it.
• Early rally? Fuck that noise. Market’s tanking harder than your shitty love life.
• Volatility is back, and it’s not here to play—get ready for a wild ride, bitch.

Impact — Crypto’s rollercoaster is wrecking portfolios and proving why you shouldn’t play with fire you can’t handle.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/09/05/ether-leads-crumbling-crypto-prices-in-shocking-reversal-from-early-rally
